data.title: Sydney Pollack
data.text:
Born: 1-Jul-1934

Birthplace: Lafayette, IN

Died: 26-May-2008

Location of death: Pacific Palisades, CA

Cause of death: Cancer - unspecified

Remains: Cremated (ashes scattered)

Gender: Male

Religion: Jewish

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Film Director, Film/TV Producer

Party Affiliation: Democratic

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Tootsie

Military service: US Army (1957-59)

Father: David Pollack

Mother: Rebecca Miller

Brother: Bernie Pollack (costumer)

Wife: Claire Griswold (m. 22-Sep-1958, one son, two daughters)

Son: Steven Pollack (b. 1959, d. 26-Nov-1993 airplane crash)

Daughter: Rebecca Pollack (b. 1963)

Daughter: Rachel Pollack (b. 1969)

Oscar for Best Director 1986 for Out of Africa

Emmy 1966 for Bob Hope Presents the Chrysler Theatre

Member of the Board of Convera (2005-08)

Bill Bradley for President

Democratic Congressional Campaign Committee

Democratic Senatorial Campaign Committee

Gephardt for President

John Kerry for President

McCain 2000

Midwest Values PAC

Motion Picture and Television Fund Board of Directors

Progressive Majority
